Module com.gang60
Package com.gang60

Class EmployeeManagementController

java.lang.Object
com.gang60.EmployeeManagementController
public class EmployeeManagementController extends Object
Controller for managing employee records in the POS system. Provides functionality to add, update, delete, and view employee information.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller after FXML loading. Sets up table columns, role choices, and loads employee data.

    • onRefresh

      public void onRefresh(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Refreshes the employee list from the database.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event (may be null)

    • onAdd

      public void onAdd(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Adds a new employee to the database. Validates that name, role, and password are provided.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event

    • onUpdate

      public void onUpdate(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Updates an existing employee's information. Requires an employee to be selected from the table.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event

    • onDelete

      public void onDelete(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Deletes an employee from the database. Requires confirmation and handles foreign key constraint violations.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event

    • onBack

      public void onBack(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Navigates back to the manager dashboard.
      Parameters:
      e - the action event
